DynamoRIO API
DynamoRIO-Based Tools

DynamoRIO-based tools are provided for direct use. A tool can be invoked using the option -t with the tool name. For example:

bin64/drrun -t drcov -- application arg1 arg2

Those interested in how the -t option works should see the section End-User Tools.

  • Library Tracing Tool
  • CPU Simulator
  • Cache Simulator
  • Code Coverage Tool
  • Dr. Memory Memory Debugging Tool
  • System Call Tracer for Windows
  • Symbol Query Tool
